mapper.sql: Resume_id, Name, Age, Sex, BirthDate, Phone, Email, ID, Address, Status, Comment, Employer, SubmitTime, UpdateTime, jobname, jobtype, HighestDegree, WorkPlace, Major_name, Province, City, Area, other
mapper.select:
SELECT distinct SubmitTime, STATUS, resumetable.resume_id, jobname, phone, email, resumetable.NAME, sex, major, school, education_extend.degree, job_info.departmentid FROM resumetable left JOIN education_extend ON resumetable.resume_id = education_extend.resume_id left JOIN job_info on resumetable.jobname=job_info.name and resumetable.jobtype=job_info.type
order by resume_id DESC

select
distinct
,
from resumetable
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from resumetable
order by ${orderByClause}
